This worked fine for me:

output = torch.autograd.Variable(torch.Tensor(2, 10).uniform_())

loss = loss_fn(output, target)

body:
@esube can you provide an example of the failure case (in code)?

This worked fine for me:
```python
output = torch.autograd.Variable(torch.Tensor(2, 10).uniform_())
target = torch.autograd.Variable(torch.Tensor(2, 10).uniform_())
weigth = torch.Tensor(10).uniform_()
loss_fn = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(weight)
loss = loss_fn(output, target)
```
